title: Ed Bramson fires broadside at Electra board
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Ed Bramson fires broadside at Electra board Ed Bramson says his public attack on Electra was a ‘last resort’ Ed Bramson says his public attack on Electra was a ‘last resort’ Harry Wilson Published 1 minute ago 
TGI Friday’s private equity owner has come under fire from its biggest shareholder, which has accused its board of being “deficient” as it steps up a campaign to install its own directors. 
In a letter to fellow investors in Electra Private Equity, Sherborne Investors Management, which has a 30 per cent stake in the London-listed company, said that the board was in hock to its managers, including hiding payments from businesses in its portfolio.
